response.overview: August in a remote Spanish village, in the middle of a wine region. It's the hottest time of the year. A beautiful au-pair is teaching German to some kids during the summer and takes advantage of the siesta hours to study Spanish herself. Yet siesta is such a voluptuous time of the day, especially if one of the locals has the habit of paying a visit with a bucket full of ice to refresh you...
response.title: Fraulein O.: Das Au-Pair
